RecipeDef.label: make a set of kraltech pills
make a set of kraltech archoboxes

AbilityDef.label: charge blast
AbilityDef.description: Channel energy into the core to fire an explosive energy-based warhead.

AbilityDef.label: plasma blast
AbilityDef.description: Channel energy into the core to fire a superheated plasma warhead.

AbilityDef.label: stun grenade
AbilityDef.description: Shoot a stun grenade hidden within the mechanical arm.

AbilityDef.label: mech berserk pulse
AbilityDef.description: Cast a transmitted berserk pulse against multiple enemies.

AbilityDef.label: psychic bullet
AbilityDef.description: Fire an explosive psychic bullet.

AbilityDef.label: tox bomb
AbilityDef.description: Fire a mech canister full of toxic gas.

AbilityDef.label: rot bomb
AbilityDef.description: Fire a mech canister full of lungrot gas.

AbilityDef.label: anti-organic grenade
AbilityDef.description: Launch an explosive payload full of anti-organic nanites,that brutaly harms organics inside a 15.9 blast radius.

AbilityDef.label: psychic blast
AbilityDef.description: Conjure a psychic explosion in any area while ignoring all forms of obstacles.

AbilityDef.label: blade shot
AbilityDef.description: Shoot a razor sharp blade using the blade horns protruding on each sides.

AbilityDef.label: inferno rocket
AbilityDef.description: Launch an explosive inferno rocket at enemies.

AbilityDef.label: anti organic orbital strike
AbilityDef.description: Unleash the wrath of the machines by blasting those filthy organics with an anti-organic orbital strike.

AbilityDef.label: death ray
AbilityDef.description: Fire a death ray that can reduce the target's capacities to 35%,along with a 20% chance of instant death.

AbilityDef.Name: LongJumpMech
AbilityDef.label: valkyrian longjump
AbilityDef.description: Allows a valkyrian to jump at distant location using special ultrafast mechanoid muscles.

AbilityDef.label: valkyrian blast
AbilityDef.description: Vaporize enemies with an anti-organic blast.

AbilityDef.label: thunder blast
AbilityDef.description: Vaporize enemies with a thunder blast.

AbilityDef.label: thunder blast orbital strike
AbilityDef.description: Unleash a barrage of thunder blasts and annihilate groups of enemies in seconds.

AbilityDef.label: energy burst
AbilityDef.description: Emit a burst of pure energy and vaporize multiple enemies under melee range.

AbilityDef.label: iron sand spear
AbilityDef.description: Launch a spear made of iron sand that can inflict iron lung towards the intended target.

AbilityDef.label: iron sand field
AbilityDef.description: Shower the enemies with a field of iron sand,which inflicts iron lung to muliple targets.

AbilityDef.label: flash arc
AbilityDef.description: Fire a deadly beam that can lower the target's defense.

AbilityDef.label: Electrify
AbilityDef.description: Rapidly energize the particles that is surrounding groups of enemies and unleash it in a violent manner that inflicts both stun and armor break at the same time.

AbilityDef.label: raise attack
AbilityDef.description: Raise a singular target's attack DPS with a raise attack buff.

AbilityDef.label: bestow defense
AbilityDef.description: Bestow a singular target with a fortified defense buff.

AbilityDef.label: cure
AbilityDef.description: Heal a singular target of any wounds. Can also heal permanent wounds,but can't regrow limbs.

AbilityDef.label: fortify morale
AbilityDef.description: Generate a powerful aura that raises the morale towards anyone who are exposed to its influence. The effect lasts 72 hours and remains attached to the caster for the duration.

AbilityDef.label: cast AOE shield
AbilityDef.description: Activate a giant shield bubble for you and your allies.

AbilityDef.label: toss grenades
AbilityDef.description: Throw an anti-personel grenade at the enemy.

AbilityDef.label: toss EMP grenades
AbilityDef.description: Throw an anti-mechanoid grenade at the enemy.

AbilityDef.label: activate camouflage
AbilityDef.description: Activate the enforcer duster's hidden camouflage module to blend into the surroundings.

AbilityDef.label: basic psychic bullet
AbilityDef.description: Fire a basic psychic bullet.

AbilityDef.label: berserker psychic bullet
AbilityDef.description: Fire a psychic bullet that has a chance to inflict berserk upon impact.

AbilityDef.label: confusion psychic bullet
AbilityDef.description: Fire a psychic bullet that has a chance to inflict confusion upon impact.

AbilityDef.label: dark psychic bullet
AbilityDef.description: Fire an ominous psychic bullet that has a chance to inflict health blight,and an even rarer chance of insta-killing a target upon impact.

AbilityDef.label: enhanced psychic bullet
AbilityDef.description: Fire an enhanced psychic bullet.

AbilityDef.label: psychic anti organic blast
AbilityDef.description: Conjure a localized anti-organic blast in a single area.

AbilityDef.label: psychic anti organic orbital strike
AbilityDef.description: Conjure an AOE anti-organic orbital strike at any chosen locations.

AbilityDef.label: mass burden pulse
AbilityDef.description: Cast a mass burden pulse against multiple enemies.

AbilityDef.label: buster cannon
AbilityDef.description: Fire an explosive charged warhead using a retractable buster cannon.

AbilityDef.label: rift walk
AbilityDef.description: Bend the fabrics of time and space to teleport yourself,and your allies,to any X,Y,Z coordinates.

AbilityDef.label: long range rift walk
AbilityDef.description: Teleport the caster,along with their allies,to any distant locations throughout the planet where a willing ally is used as a beacon for mass transport.

AbilityDef.label: self heal
AbilityDef.description: Heal yourself from any wounds by hastening the body's blood clotting process and boost its natural healing ability.

AbilityDef.label: gravity jump
AbilityDef.description: Jump to a distant location using gravitational propulsion.

AbilityDef.label: overdrive
AbilityDef.description: Activate the archotech heart's main function and enter in an overdriven state.

AbilityDef.label: overclock
AbilityDef.description: Temporarily void the extended warranty in order to become nimble and increadibly effective in ranged combat.

AbilityDef.label: mass beckon
AbilityDef.description: Attract multiple targets under a 14.9 radius and force them to draw near you.

AbilityDef.label: reinforce
AbilityDef.description: Temporarily grant the user an increased defense buff.

AbilityDef.label: deploy shield generator
AbilityDef.description: Deploy a mini broad shield generator.

AbilityDef.label: first aid
AbilityDef.description: Distribute a concoction that temporarily seal the target's open wounds,preserving their life until they recieve medical treatment.

AbilityDef.label: immunogen
AbilityDef.description: Distribute a potent medicine that raises the target's immune system.

AbilityDef.label: regen serum
AbilityDef.description: Distribute a potent serum that can heal major injuries.

AbilityDef.label: dispense cure-all injector
AbilityDef.description: Bring out a cure-all injector inside the backpack.

AbilityDef.label: morphine shot
AbilityDef.description: Distribute a potent solution that fully suppresses the target's feeling of pain.

AbilityDef.label: sniper discipline
AbilityDef.description: Temporarily grant the user an increased accuracy in range weapons.

AbilityDef.label: camouflage
AbilityDef.description: Activate the inner stealth module which renders the user invisible.

AbilityDef.label: EMP launcher
AbilityDef.description: Shoot an explosive EMP warhead that can disable groups of mechanoids.

AbilityDef.label: nanite assault
AbilityDef.description: Invade the body of multiple targets with harmful nanites that lowers some of their body's capacities and forces them to go berserk.

AbilityDef.label: magnesium grenade
AbilityDef.description: Throw a packed liquid magnesium grenade that slows the target and make them flamable.

AbilityDef.label: spawn food dispenser
AbilityDef.description: Spawn a food dispensing structure that dispense 5 pieces of packed survival meals every 24 hours,and disappears after 5 days.

AbilityDef.label: spawn ammo dispenser
AbilityDef.description: Spawn an ammo dispensing structure that dispense a box full of high caliber ammunition every 24 hours,and disappears after 5 days.

AbilityDef.label: spawn mini generator
AbilityDef.description: Spawn a small generator that generates 500 watts of electricity,and disappears after 5 days.

AbilityDef.label: deploy land mines
AbilityDef.description: Deploy military-grade landmines permanently.

AbilityDef.label: deploy pulse turret
AbilityDef.description: Deploy an automatic,self-powered pulse turret that provides solid cover fire,then disappears after the entire day.

AbilityDef.label: deploy machinegun turret
AbilityDef.description: Deploy an automatic machinegun turret that fortifies defensive positions,and permanently stays in the colony.

ThingDef.label: PGI survival meal dispenser
ThingDef.description: A small food dispenser that slowly generates survival meals.

ThingDef.label: PGI mini generator
ThingDef.description: A small generator that produces 1000000 watts of electricity for free.

ThingDef.label: PGI ammo dispenser
ThingDef.description: A small ammo dispenser that slowly fabricates high caliber ammunition.

ThingDef.label: PGI landmine
ThingDef.description: A military-grade high explosive trap that explodes upon contact of a hostile being. This trap also possess increadible damage and armor penetration.

ThingDef.label: PGI broad shield generator
ThingDef.description: A small energy shield device deployed by a militor heavy. Unlike other shield generators, this particular shield generator can block both bullet and mortar fire, and can cover a wide area of land that can shield an entire squad of combatants.

ThingDef.label: PGI pulse turret
ThingDef.description: A rapid-fire, self-powered pulse turret created by the mechanical hands of a militor specalist.

ThingDef.label: PGI pulse turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic energy weapon made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: PGI heavy machinegun turret
ThingDef.description: A full auto heavy machinegun turret created by a militor specialist.

ThingDef.label: PGI HMG turret
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic machinegun made to be mounted on a turret.

HediffDef.label: brain bodule: mechanitor kraltech
HediffDef.description: A kraltech module enhancing ability of mechanitors.

HediffDef.label: torso bodule: exo-armor kraltech
HediffDef.description: A kraltech module that makes implanter covered by a powerful exoskeleton powerarmor.

HediffDef.label: torso module: mech-assistant kraltech
HediffDef.description: A kraltech module which can produces a swarm of assistant nanomachines with great versatility.
